content_analysis.posting_frequency: Semi-weekly (2x per week) - consistent with podcast schedule
content_analysis.style_notes: One of the most viewed unscripted, direct-to-camera self-help series in YouTube history. Focus on authentic, personal storytelling combined with actionable high-performance strategies. Content repurposed across multiple formats (transcripts, podcasts, blog posts, quotes).

additional_insights.podcast_name: Progress Mode with Brendon Burchard (formerly The Brendon Show)
additional_insights.podcast_ranking: #1 debut in iTunes, regularly in top podcasts for Self-Help and Health
additional_insights.recognition: Success Magazine named him 'one of the most watched, followed, and quoted personal development trainers in history'
